verses.name: Ezekiel 26:4
verses.text: And they shall destroy the walls of Tyrus, and break down her towers: I will also scrape her dust from her, and make her like the top of a rock.

verses.name: Ezekiel 26:5
verses.text: It shall be a place for the spreading of nets in the midst of the sea: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord God: and it shall become a spoil to the nations.

verses.name: Ezekiel 26:6
verses.text: And her daughters which are in the field shall be slain by the sword; and they shall know that I am the Lord.
